trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of application settings providers.
trans-unit.target: 表示应用程序设置提供程序的集合。

trans-unit.source: The SettingsProviderCollection class is a straightforward extension of the <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection> class to provide for storage of <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider> objects.
trans-unit.target: SettingsProviderCollection 类为简单扩展<xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection>类以提供用于存储<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider>对象。</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider> </xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase> class uses this collection to manage the settings providers associated with each of its application settings properties through the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProviderAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase>此集合来管理的设置提供程序与每个<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProviderAttribute>.</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProviderAttribute>通过其应用程序设置属性关联的类使用</xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProviderCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProviderCollection"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This is the default constructor that is implicitly provided.
trans-unit.target: 这是隐式提供的默认构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new settings provider to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 向集合中添加新的设置提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Name%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider> is used as the storage key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Name%2A>属性<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider>用作存储密钥。</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider> </xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Although the Add method has a single <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase> parameter to match the signature of this same method in the base class <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection>, this method will throw an exception if the `provider` parameter is not of type <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 尽管 Add 方法具有单个<xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase>参数与此相同的方法在基类中的签名匹配<xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection>，此方法将引发异常，如果`provider`参数不是类型<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider>.</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider> </xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection> </xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase"></xref> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase"> </xref>要添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: The provider parameter is not of type .
trans-unit.target: provider 参数的类型不是 。

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Name*> property of the provider parameter is null or an empty string. -or- A settings provider with the same <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Name*> already exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: -或- <> </> *1> 提供程序参数的属性为 null 或空字符串。 -具有相同的设置提供程序<> *1> 集合中已存在。

trans-unit.source: The collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 集合是只读的。

trans-unit.source: The provider parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The provider parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Gets the settings provider in the collection that matches the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 获取与指定的名称匹配的集合中的设置提供程序。

trans-unit.source: You can make a <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProviderCollection> read-only by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection.SetReadOnly%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProviderCollection>使用只读<xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection.SetReadOnly%2A>方法。</xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection.SetReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProviderCollection>

trans-unit.source: However, it is invalid to methods such as <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProviderCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection.Remove%2A>, and <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection.Clear%2A> on such a collection.
trans-unit.target: 但是，它为无效而方法如<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProviderCollection.Add%2A>， <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection.Remove%2A>，和<xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection.Clear%2A>上此类集合。</xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProviderCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the friendly name of the settings provider.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含设置提供程序的友好名称。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If found, the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProvider"></xref> whose name matches that specified by the name parameter; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到， <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProvider"> </xref>其名称与匹配指定的 name 参数中; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The name parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The name parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The collection is read-only when setting this value.
trans-unit.target: 设置此值时，集合是只读的。
